title: 2 bans in 1 for being solo q'ed
body: was in a norms match with 4 premades game finishs nothing come up played again after the next game i had 2 bans gj rito just because i wouldnt play what they wanted me to i get bans for it thanks

replies.body:
You did obviously did not get banned for not playing what someone else wanted you to play.

You haven't explained much in your post, but it seems you were banned for insulting other players in-game. Remember, it doesn't matter whether _"they started it"_, just because someone else is an asshole it doesn't give you the right to be one too.

You also didn't receive two punishments for one game BTW. One of them is for a previous game. You must have just queued up before the report could be processed.
